response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $10,000 for it. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a strategic midpoint between its intrinsic value to me and your perceived value for it. I am confident this price will be beneficial for both of us. Please let me know if you require any additional information or have questions about the product. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 10000}
